body.name: Big and Tall 500lbs Office Chair,Heavy Duty Large PU Leather Executive Desk Chair with Wide Seat, Adjustbale Ergonomic Lumbar Support High Back Rocking Computer Chair for Heavy People (Brown)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 3 mins
features: ✨【500LBS Big and Tall People】Our heavy duty leather executive chairs feature high load-bearing thick metal base stool and reinforced class-4 air rod, the strong frame allow office chair hold up to 500lbs, which is very friendly for big man.

✨【Adjustbale Ergonomic Lumbar Support】With a built-in adjustable ergonomic lumbar support, you can adjust forward or backward to achieve a spinal support point you feel comfortable with. It releases back pressure and relieves back pain, keep you comfortable during the long hours of woking, studying, or gaming.

✨【Wide and Large Padded Seat Cushion 】This big and tall office chair designed with an extra wide and deep depth seat cushion, which is made of high density thick foam padding. Plus wide soft back on both sides, they can fully embrace your back and hip, and provide enough support for your legs to easily distribute the pressure on your lower body.

✨【Quality PU Leather Material】Our chair selected premium PU leather, with breathable, wear resistance, durable features, sitting for a long time not stuffy. This wide office chair will keep you comfy throughout the whole day.

✨【Rocking and Reclining Functions 】The desk chair has 360° free swivel, 3.94 inches (10cm) adjustable height, and smooth wheels that not scrath your floor. And with the ergonomically designed, the chair also has a rocking function, can be tilted back at 90°-135°. It's very suitable for leaning back after busy work for a nap, give you a relaxing experience.

✨【Excellent After-Sale Service】The executive chair comes with installation manual and a video so you can quickly assemble it.12 Monthes warranty, if you have any questions, you can contact our professional after-sales team, they will reply within 24 hours to solve.

It is a high back office chair with a wider, thicker seat cushion and resilient spring set. As well as an bulid in adjustable lumbar support, providing a ergonomic support system, that can reduce back pain due to long working hours. Also we adoptd the heavy duty metal base for easy access by taller users, providing plenty of comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable with Sturdy frame support
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this chair to upgrade from my old one, and it was delivered on time. Assembly was quick, took me about 20-25 minutes even without using any instructions. Upon completion, my initial impression was one of regality and elegance, it has leather covering that is wear resistance. The chair's comfort is particularly noteworthy, addressing my need for extended seating during long hours.It looks durable & it can handle high weight limits, leather is heavy-duty and a robust frame supported by a sturdy metal base capable of accommodating up to 500lbs. This makes it an ideal choice for individuals with a larger build.The chair is equipped with ergonomic lumbar support that can be easily adjusted to meet individual preferences. Its flexibility allows for forward or backward movement, which helps with spinal support, relieving back pressure, and comfort for extended periods of work, study, or gaming. The cushion is well padded which is crafted with thick foam, it adds to the overall comfort.It offers a 360° free swivel and a 3.94-inch adjustable height. To safeguard my floor, I use a floor mat to prevent any potential scratching from the wheels. This chair seamlessly combines style, durability, and comfort, making it a splendid addition to my workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some QC issues, but otherwise sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The best part about this chair IMO is that it gets the seat height right. Many of these heavy chairs sit too low even when fully raised.What I like:The chair's padding is firm and supportive. It doesn't wobble under weight. The wheels roll smoothly. Assembly was very straightforward. The arms have recesses that lock into the screw bosses of the back, so attaching it was way simpler than it is with a lot of chairs that go together the same way this one does.The instructions are well illustrated and well written. There's even a QR code that takes you to an assembly video which is very well done.Of course, I like that the seat height advertised is accurate. (I tried several chairs where it wasn't and they sat too low).The rocking works well - it doesn't let you tilt so far back you think you're going to tip over.What I don't like:The hex wrench handle should be rounded. It isn't sharp but it has pointy edges that hurt your hands when you apply the amount of force needed to tighten these screws.There are a ton of quality control issues, starting with the way it's packed. When this arrived, one of the legs of the base had busted through the side of the box and scraped on something - there were spots where the paint was scratched off.This wasn't properly cleaned or shipped with silicone drying pads. There was a white crusty substance on the base that almost looked like salt. If it hadn't been painted I would have thought it was flux residue.You can see foam poking out of one of the arm rests where the lining wasn't properly positioned before the cushion was fixed to the armrest.The seat has a rather large and obvious scuff mark near one corner, despite arriving with the plastic protective cover intact.Conclusion:500lb is probably exaggerating a bit. It could probably stand that for about five minutes. But 250 I believe it can do all day every day. This is not a scientific opinion, it's just my best guess. It's comfortable, easy to assemble and looks nice despite having some QC problems. I feel like it's over priced by about 15% but otherwise it's a great chair and I can recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair looks very high quality and sturdy,rotates smoothly, is very easy to install, and is comfortable to sit on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair for my husband because we works in office and he has lower back problems due to his bad office chair. He said that he feels better in this chair and that it’s more comfortable. He doesn’t have this pressure as before. I’m glad I bought it. Plus the price was very reasonable. Good quality and lovely color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is very comfortable to sit on. The front of the seat cushion is a little higher to prevent you from sliding down. I like the design very much. The quality is very good and the appearance is simple and elegant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adjust assembly for children
reviews.reviewText: The assembly instructions include adding the lumbar support control without securing the attached cord. Unfortunately that means the cord hangs down at just the hight for little fingers and is wide enough for a child to get their head into and get stuck. We adjusted the installation to catch the cord under the seat plate and it seems to be doing fine.The chair itself is extremely comfortable - some of us have even slept in it. The rocking is natural and smooth and the wheels glode easily even over carpet.The materials are very strong and I don't doubt the high weight limit. It's not quite as tall as we had hoped, but it works. I am 5 foot 9 inches and the headrest is perfect for me. For my 6 foot 3 inch tall husband it is a tad low.Overall an excellent executive chair with minor tweaks needed for a home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very practical chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair is very comfortable and back support is very good, building the chair was very easy and quick. Quality of chair is very good, can sit for hours and still be very comfortable. Height of the chair is very good and perfect for the office or at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and comfortable on sit
reviews.reviewText: First at all， I only take 20 minutes to install the chair.And then the wire-controlled chassis only needs to be dialed up and down to achieve precise one-button control, making daily experience more convenient. It also provides adaptive back support for different body types.In general, this chair is cost-effective and suitable for use at home, in offices, and dormitories. Finally, I will share it here. According to your own needs, the one that suits you is the best.
